title: My game crashed and im getting penalized for it?
body: So i qued up for a friend, things were going fine, but when we got in a game, my game crashed and now i have to wait 15 min ._.

replies.body: Did you see a specific behavior or error message when the crash happened? A few more details will help me figure out what exactly happened so I can help you fix it. ^.^
nope, i was out of league and i clicked on league to go back to it, it showed the loading symbol(usually when somethings crashing like chrome or another program, etc) and then it closed.
Ah, so you *Alt+Tabbed* out of League while in the loading screen?

It sounds like you experienced an *unstable connection* to our matchmaking servers. I suggest working through the steps within our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so you can ensure your local network settings are configured properly for League.

Let me know if this impacted your issue at all.
